summary: Tested bug fixes: product images display, absolute URLs for uploads, social media links, and sitemap.xml accessibility. All features verified working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bug fixes verified: 1) Product images with uploaded URLs display correctly (absolute URLs starting with https://), 2) Image upload endpoint returns absolute URLs, 3) Footer social links point to @groupeyamaplus accounts, 4) sitemap.xml is accessible, 5) Navigation works properly without scrolling to footer.

product_images_display.category_electronique_page: PASS - 13 products displayed with images loading correctly
product_images_display.uploaded_images: PASS - Found 4 products with uploaded images (absolute URLs starting with https://stable-prod.preview.emergentagent.com/api/uploads/)
product_images_display.images_accessible: PASS - All uploaded images return HTTP 200 with correct content-type

image_upload_endpoint.returns_absolute_url: PASS - Upload returns URL starting with https://stable-prod.preview.emergentagent.com/api/uploads/
image_upload_endpoint.image_accessible_after_upload: PASS - Uploaded images can be retrieved via GET request

seo_sitemap.contains_main_pages: PASS - Contains homepage, categories, main pages

navigation.footer_not_visible_on_load: PASS - Footer at 5930px, not visible on 1080px viewport
navigation.footer_link_navigation: PASS - À propos link navigates correctly to /a-propos

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Images produits non affichées après création
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Image upload now returns absolute URLs (https://...) instead of relative URLs (/api/uploads/...)
All 5 social media links (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, Snapchat) point to @groupeyamaplus accounts

notes_on_paytech: PayTech is configured with PAYTECH_ENV=prod but account activation is a PayTech-side issue, not a code bug. No code changes needed.
